string.value: A mysterious potion created through Alchemy. Use it to become invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion created through Alchemy. Increases EXP by 10% for 2 hours. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time, but alchemists may use up to 2 at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion created through Alchemy. Increases item and meso drop rate by 10% for 2 hours. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time, but alchemists may use up to 2 at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: A 3x Giant Potion received after defeating the Giant Moon Bunny. What mysterious powers could it hold? \n#c* Caution: Use might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A 5x Giant Potion received after defeating the Giant Moon Bunny. What mysterious powers could it hold? \n#c* Caution: Use might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion brewed by a very paranoid witch on Hallow's Eve. Makes you invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Resistance Potion made to celebrate the year of the dragon. Abnormal Status Resistance +10% for 2 hours on use. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time,

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases STR, DEX, INT, and LUK by 30, and Speed by 30, and Jump by 23 for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases ATT and M. ATT by 12 and can be used with other ATT potions. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that makes the imbiber invincible for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases item and meso drop rates by 10% for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pungent alchemical concoction that increases EXP gains by 10% for 2 hours. Alchemists are able to stomach two at a time, but they are too strong for any one else to drink more than one.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion that contains the power of Chronos, a god of the ancient Giants. What mysterious powers does it hold? \n#c* Caution: Using it might cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases STR, DEX, INT, LUK, Speed, and Jump by 20 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases ATT & M. ATT by 4 for 15 minutes. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion dropped by the Rhinojinn. Increases MAX HP by 2000 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion that blesses the chosen. Increases STR, DEX, INT, LUK, Speed, and Jump by 10 for 1 hour. However, you can only use 1 potion at a time.\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing from Cassandra. Weapon/Magic ATT +10, Weapon/Magic DEF +150, Accuracy/Avoidability +100, Movement Speed +7, and Jump +5 for 30 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blessing from Cassandra. Weapon/Magic ATT +10, Weapon/Magic DEF +150, Accuracy/Avoidability +100, Movement Speed +7, and Jump +5 for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A healing tonic made with Edmund's secret recipe. Just the thing when you're feeling under the weather! [Restores 50% of HP and MP, also gives +14 W. Att + 30 M.Att, for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A jewel crafted by Prendergast for his daughter, intended as a protective gift for her 16th birthday.

null.name: [Restores all HP/MP, +50 Weapon Defense, +50 Magic Defense for 10 minutes. 5 uses.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiger balm. Made from tigers. Weapon/Magic ATT +20, Weapon/Magic DEF +400, Accuracy/Avoidability +200, and Movement Speed/Jump +10 for 1 hour.

null.name: [Gives +60 Weapon Attack, +60 Speed, +60 Avoidability for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: Tiger pill. Made from tigers. Weapon/Magic ATT +10, Weapon/Magic DEF +150, Accuracy/Avoidability +100, and Movement Speed/Jump 3 for 20 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is cherry-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restore 1200HP, 1200MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is lime-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 HP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is grape-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Super-chewy gummy slimes. This one is orange-flavored. If only real Slimes tasted this good. [Restores 600HP, 600MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mouth-watering, delectable sweet treat! [Gives +100 Accuracy for 1 minute]

string.name: desc
string.value: A small note written by Tae Roon. This note is enchanted, so it boosts weapon attack and magic attack by 3 for 1 minute.

string.name: desc
string.value: Delicious mushroom candy from Sen. This candy makes anyone feel good about themselves. So good, that it boosts Jump +3 for 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pieces of pumpkin left over from making halloween Jack-o'-Lanterns. The pumpkin, perfectly ripe, has an aroma that is sweeter than ever. Each piece recovers 50 HP and 50 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A candy wrapped in stripes. Kids love it. Recovers 20 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Received a mysterious power from the Glowing Rock. Boosts the weapon attack and magic attack slightly for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small hole is up on the top of the Coconut, where the straw goes in. Drink the juice with the straw for maximum refreshment. Recovers 100 HP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red crystal with a mysterious power packed in. Attack +5 for 5 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue crystal fragment filled with mysterious power. Accuracy +100 for 5 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious scoop of stuffing. This treat comes around only once in a while so eat it up before it gets cold. \n[Restores 600 HP/ 600 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: This delicious cranberry sauce complements almost any meal! \n[Gives + 30 Magic Attack for 3 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: It looks like someone dropped this potato. \n[Restores 800 HP]

string.name: desc
string.value: The only thing better than a gravy boat is a gravy train. \n[Restores 800 MP]

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fist used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts weapon and magic attack.

string.name: desc
string.value: A set of wings used during the Hunting Tournament. Boosts speed and jump.

string.name: desc
string.value: An eyeball-rotating skull used during the Hunting Tournament. Inverts directions.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious looking Christmas Ham with a sprig of mistletoe on top.\nRecovers 3000 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: The traditional Versalmas dinner. Smells... like fish. \nRecovers 2385 HP and 3791 MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cheese from the alternate dimension of Versal. Looks funny but smells quite nice. \nGives +220 Magic Attack for 2 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: Olives frosted with pink sugar -- a special treat beloved by children from Versal! \nGives +40 Speed and + 25 Jump for 5 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: O-Pongo's favorite treat! Creamy caramel with a crunchy onion center! \nRestores 800 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crispy wafer layered with chocolate creme. \nGives +40 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: SPF 1000. Blocks all harmful rays, including magical ones. \nGives +200 Magic Defense for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A piece of cake that consists of snow-white whipped cream and cherry. Recovers 300 HP and MP.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases Physical Attack Power by 20 and Magic Attack Power by 30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A string of Chinese firecrackers known to scare away ghoulish spirits.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fiery black liquid that gives the user the power of a thousand demons when consumed. [Gives +140 Weapon Attack for 8 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: Drinking the swirling blue liquid within this small iron pot fills the user with an energy that emanates a protective aura. [Gives +100 Overall Defense, +200 Magic Attack for 10 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: John Barricade's special concoction, used to get him out of tight jams. For use in emergencies! [Gives +50 Avoidability, +50 Accuracy, +10 Jump for 5 minutes]

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A power scream from Maple Admin. Weapon attack +8, Magic attack +12 for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Weapon attack +20, Magic attack +30 for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This mystical camouflage allows the user to blend into his or her surroundings. [Gives +100 Avoidability for 5 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A mixture made from an ancient Taru shaman recipe. Instills warriors with the primal strength of the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +35 Weapon Attack, +10 Accuracy for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Special incense used by ancient Taru shamans for communion rituals with the Jungle Spirit. [Gives +90 Magic Attack for 20 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious natural beverage made from a secret blend of jungle fruits, flowers, roots, and vines. The perfect thing to fuel a Taru brave through a long jungle trek! [Restores 1000 HP and 2000 MP.]

string.name: desc
string.value: Spread all over the Maple World for the 4th anniversary of MapleStory, this note contains the prizes that you'll win when this is found.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious chocolate cupcake with vanilla cream filling. One taste and you'll be hooked! [Restores 300 HP & MP, and gives +30 Accuracy, +30 Speed, and +30 Jump for 3 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: A rare, tasty dessert. Known as the 'Warrior's Dessert' to some and the 'Fattening Treat' to others. [Gives +30 Weapon Attack for 3 minutes.]

string.value: It's the absolute truth, but it really hurts. It might be better to not know the truth, for what you don't know can't hurt you. Provides WEAPON ATT +10 and MAGIC ATT +8 in your enraged state, but you suffer -50 MP for mental trauma.

string.value: What you don't know can't hurt you. If the truth is too much to handle, avoiding it may be wise. It provides Critical +10 in your consideration for others, but you suffer -80 HP because of the anxiety that comes after telling a lie.

string.value: A basket that contains a fruit for the Fruit Museum that you plucked from a tree. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a fossil for the Fossil Museum that was excavated from a crystal pillar. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains an ordinary fish for the Marine Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains an ordinary fruit for the Fruit Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains an ordinary fossil for the Fossil Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a great fish for the Marine Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a sparkling fruit for the Fruit Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: A basket that contains a primal fossil for the Fossil Museum. Double-click to check the contents.

string.name: desc
string.value: Upgrades Weapon ATT/Magic ATT Buff effects and EXP Bonus when used in conjunction with a Basic Value Pack. Duration can purchased in 1 day intervals. \n#cWorks immediately upon purchase. Only affects EXP Bonus and Weapon ATT/Magic Buff.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious scent permeates the air. Those who smelt it will receive a 10% increase to Max HP for 15 min. Those who dealt it will pretend like they got the buff and then make a joke about their dog.

string.name: desc
string.value: Refreshingly delightful. Those who smell the Floral Scent will receive a 10% increase to Max Mana for 15 min.

string.name: desc
string.value: Dedication to fine clothes grants Weapon ATT and Magic ATT +30 for 2 hr.

string.name: desc
string.value: This book opens up into a dimension made up entirely of scrolls. It's way better than the dimension made up of poisonous flip-flops. Use to receive one random Weapon Scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: This book opens up into a dimension made up entirely of scrolls. It's way better than the dimension made up of poisonous flip-flops. Use to receive one random Armor Scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: This book opens up into a dimension made up entirely of scrolls. It's way better than the dimension made up of poisonous flip-flops. Use to receive one random Accessory Scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dark Kerning City.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to Sleepywood, a quiet and dark forest-town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the dead mine at the higher ground of El Nath.\nCan only be used in Orbis and El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: Returns you to the nearest town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows you to return to the Omega Sector Command Center. Can only be used in the Ludibrium area.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows you to return to Ludibrium. Can only be used in the Ludibrium area.

string.name: desc
string.value: Warp powder made by fairy Phyllia. Teleports you to Magatia when used inside the Nihal desert region.

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll enables you to return to the Pirate village, Nautilus. This is a one use item and will disappear after use.

string.name: name
string.value: Return to New Leaf City Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to venture back to New Leaf City whenever you want!

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that the Red Lion King gave to his knights. When used, you will move to the Audience Room of the Red Lion King.

string.name: desc
string.value: A warp capsule that allows the owner of the capsule to warp to the Command Center of Omega Sector.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to move to your spouse's current map. #cDouble click# to use.\nIf your spouse is in a restricted area or you can't teleport from your current location, this stone is unusable.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that teleports you to White Wave Harbor. It will disappear once used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that returns you to Elluel. It will disappear once used.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted ticket that transports you to the Silent Crusade's Hideout. Crumbles to dust after one use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Dangerous Cave. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Subway Ticketing Booth. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket that takes you to the Relic Excavation Camp. Disappears when used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Given upon using a Zakum Dungeon Additional Entry Ticket. Disappears once used. Only use this scroll in channels where Zakum can be summoned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Given upon using a Horntail Dungeon Additional Entry Ticket. Disappears once used. Only use this scroll in channels where Horntail can be summoned.

string.name: desc
string.value: Takes you directly to the Gold Beach Resort. Disappears after one use.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation from the Masked Man to the Halloween Party at the Haunted Mansion. Double-click to move straight to the mansion.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the studio for the event 'For Guild Only.'

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the moon, sent by the Moon Bunnies. Using this will send you directly to Moon Bunny's ????.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to the baby bird's nest sent by Gaga. Use it to be sent directly to the nest.

string.name: desc
string.value: An invitation to Ereve from Neinheart. This invitation will allow you to instantly move to Ereve.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that allows you to attend the 5th Anniversary Family Photo Shoot Event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A teleport ticket given by the Maple Admin. It will immediately teleport you to Rien.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Special Training Invitation that Ferdi, the Edelstein School Headmaster, gave you. Double-click on it to go to the classroom where the Special Training will be held.

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that can teleport to El Nath. Once used, you will directly teleport to El Nath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A book Tae Gong found in the sea. It is written in a bizarre language you can't read. \n#cDouble-click# to go into the book.

string.name: desc
string.value: An unbelievable lamp made by Richie Gold. Use this, and you'll be led somewhere in in the maze. No one knows exactly where you'll be sent, though.

string.name: desc
string.value: Summons 3 Slimes, Pigs, Orange Mushrooms, Bubblings, Octopuses, Green Mushrooms, and Horny Mushrooms each.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.value: Summons one of each monsters featured in Monster Attack Level 4 ~ Level 7.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to ring the bell and summon a marvelous monster.\nCannot be used near portals, in town, or any maps where Teleport and Summon are prohibited.

string.name: desc
string.value: #Double-click# to summon the glowing ghost that lives in this bell.\nCannot be used in town or near portals.

string.value: Summons a bomb to steel wool from sheep.

string.name: desc
string.value: Plants a Rose Thorn Bush to keep Wolves away.

string.name: desc
string.value: For use in the restricted bonus map area of the subway station.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Small pets love them. Recovers 30 Fullness. NOT for human!

string.name: desc
string.value: A high-quality dry treat that the Pigmies love. Pets love them, too.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on the item to send a New Year's card to a character of your choice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used on suspected botters. Usable only when a suspect is hunting.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Orange Mushroom. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Orange Mushroom. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Grey. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Grey. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: This potion, given to you by Moira, transforms you into a dragon for a while.

string.name: desc
string.value: A crystal piece that resembles Blue Ribbon Pig. When used, the crystal will melt into the body, and its mythical power will transform the user into Blue Ribbon Pig. This mythical power will last for an hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion that can transform you into Tigun the guard.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special shell only found through Mano. Apparently it's powerful enough to grant a wish...

string.name: desc
string.value: First the body feels light, then all of a sudden, you're floating. Oh no, you're a ghost!

string.name: desc
string.value: A ghost-shaped candy with a mysterious set of ingredients. Apparently it has some special powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: An abandoned doll that Sophillia threw away a long time ago, but revived by the Masked Man. Pet its hair, and you'll turn into Sophillia for 3 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment this potion is taken, you'll become a powerful, otherworldly being.

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into a small, cute mouse.

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious skills of an old halfling has transformed you into a form of a dragon. You can now fly.

string.name: desc
string.value: The more you look at it, the more you feel lightheaded… and you feel closer to the moon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sweet, delicious rice cake. Sometimes creates an interesting set of powers.

string.name: desc
string.value: The moment you drink this potion, you'll become the biggest star in the world of Maple, Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A transformation potion from the masked gentleman that allows you to transform into Peto for 15 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: No one knows what you'll transform into when you drink this, but something WILL happen for one hour. It's all about the risk...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on this to transform a character of your choice. Which one? Try it and find out!

string.name: desc
string.value: You've entered a fable and transformed into Geppetto. You're feel a bit sluggish, but do your best to leave the dungeon with your party members.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture given by Cody of himself. I get a feeling something fun will happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A picture of a delicious cake that Cody gave as a gift. I get a feeling something funny with happen when I use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: The mysterious force emanating from the crystal statue shall be absorbed into your body, and you will no longer find yourself as you are.

string.value: Restores tamed monster's fatigue level by 30.

string.name: desc
string.value: Pheremone perfume created by Kenta. Use it to tame a Wild Pig at Korean Folk Town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch with a jewel on the surface. Possesses a special power in that double-clicking the pouch will suck up the surrounding ghosts in the area.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special alchemist tool that converts an absorbed power of monster into a jewel. The inner part seems to be slightly transparent.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cliff's magic cane. Can be used to tame a Lost Rudolph.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's a special magic marble that can contain and purify a monster.

string.name: desc
string.value: The calabash Arec gave you along with the mission. When the King Sage Cat's HP is below 30%, double-click the calabash to seal the King Sage Cat inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can be used near aliens to take photos of them.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special magic marble that can contain a poisoned monster on the 3rd floor.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish net intended to catch something. Can be used with Gaga.

string.name: desc
string.value: A red ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A green ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A blue ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A purple ribbon that helps catch Maze Pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hodori.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Hogul.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Growlie.

string.name: desc
string.value: An instant camera that can capture a photo of Tiger.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net that Robinson gave you. You can use it to catch fishes in Aqua Road.

string.name: desc
string.value: A net used for catching a Serpent that has been weakened. Double-click on it to catch a weakend Serpent.

string.name: desc
string.value: A strong cage made of metal. Double-click on it to catch Eleanor's pet after it has been weakened.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used for catching a weakened Ribbon Pig. Double-click on it to catch the pig.

string.name: desc
string.value: A sack for capturing weakened Ligators. Double-click to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted bottle that can contain the essence of pure light. Double-click on it to capture weakened Spirits of Light.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted pouch that can contain the Giant Nependeath. Double-click on it to capture weakened Giant Nependeath.

string.name: desc
string.value: A score used by a ghost that appears in the Music Room. It has a total of 13 pages.

string.name: desc
string.value: A glass bottle that contains an actual lava, which is waiting to be spilled out. Drink this lava, and the lava will consume the body with fire, which will enable the drinker to master Fire Demon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mechanical device that produces black clouds. Enables the character to acquire the Smokescreen skill using the clouds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stimulant packaged inside a bottle that resembles a clenched fist. Drinking the stimulant will allow the character to acquire Hero's Will.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Minerva#, which represents wisdom, can be used to search for items sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears right after showing the results of the item search#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to #cteleport to most other locations through the World Map [W]#. 
Also allows you to #cmove to a map where a specified character is# if they are in the same world and channel. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of Subani's sacred Scrolls. If used in conjunction with a normal or Dark Scroll, the number of item upgrade slots will not be deducted if the scroll fails. However, if using a Dark Scroll, there is still a chance that your weapon will be destroyed.

string.value: It's full of mysterious scribbles. \n#cA quest will begin when you double-click it.#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A golden compass that reveals the location of Gold Richie's Treasure Island. \n#cBy double-clicking it# you can move to the island.

string.name: desc
string.value: A perfume that contains the scent of an inexperienced adventurer. \n#cBy double-clicking on it#, that scent is released to confuse monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: An artifact with an unknown date of origin.\n#cDouble-click# on it to find out its date of origin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen popsicle that tranforms you into a Peng Peng. There's no determining the type of Peng Peng you'll transform into.

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful chemical extracted from a Poison Mushroom. Helps you remove sprawling, thorny magic barriers in the forest.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic powder that eliminates the thorns from sprawling vines.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ice box filled with items that will help you stay cool in the summer. The contents will melt if you don't open it during the event period.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box whose contents are unknown, though a Yellow Butterfly might just be hidden inside. It will be empty if opened by a character higher than Lv. 71.

string.value: A black bag you received from Hiver, a member of the Black Wings. Release it in front of the Safe...

string.value: A special Energy Capsule for Resistance members. It can only be used by Resistance members Level 30 or above, and may be used up to 7 times. A large amount of EXP will be gained when used.\n#cExpires: Jan 18th#

string.name: desc
string.value: A special Energy Capsule. Starting on Jan 19, it can be used by anyone Level 30 or above, and may be used up to 7 times (Including the number of times the Resistance Energy Capsule is used). A large amount of EXP will be gained when used.\n#cExpires: Feb 28th#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A tasty watermelon obtained from the Tasty Watermelon Pot. Better enjoy it before it goes bad!
#cDouble-click on it to obtain
an Alarm Clock (Right) and one of the following buffs:
-Lv. 30 or below-
ATT/M. ATT +20
Weapon/Magic DEF+200
HP+500
-Lv. 31-70-
ATT/M. ATT +30
Weapon/Magic DEF +300
HP +1000
-Lv. 71 or higher-
ATT/M. ATT +40
Weapon/Magic DEF +400
HP +1500
Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A fragrant box obtained by diligently filling out the Tasty Watermelon Farming Journal. Contains a Tasty Watermelon Necklace.\n#cYou can open it by double-clicking on it.#

string.name: desc

Buffs can be stacked with other buffs, aside from additional watermelon buffs.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Mimir's Well Water, prepared especially for Cannoneers. You can't consume more than 100 of them and you can only consume them until December 20th.\n#cWhen consumed by a Cannoneer, EXP will increase by 10% before level 50. From level 50 to 99, EXP will increase by 5%. It can't be consumed at level 100 or higher.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Special cheer given to newly reborn Dual Blades. Increases Max HP/MP for 30 minutes. Higher the level, higher the amount increased, and can be stacked with other buffs. It does not disappear from the inventory after use. Can be used as much as desired during the event period at 30-minute intervals.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter sent to you by an anonymous admirer in lieu of White Day. You can feel how much love was put into it...maybe you should open it...

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box given by #cMatilda#k, manager of Premium PC Cafe. Can only be received once a day. Not even Matilda knows what's inside. \n#cDouble-click# to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Panda Mount] for 1 year.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the Mount skill [Panda Mount] for 15 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hilla's treasured pet, Blackheart, sleeps within this box. #cDouble-click# to obtain [Pet] Blackheart or Blackheart's Earrings.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect 10 to make an Nebulite Diffuser.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to teleport to the desired town, no matter the continent. Disappears 3 hours after the receipt. #cCan be used once every 30 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Evil Spirit Box obtained after defeating Eregos. It feels like useful items will be inside. However, it must be opened by the midnight of 9/4/2012.\r\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Box from the 3!3!3! event.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\nMust be opened by 09/24/12.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gold box from the 3!3!3! event.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\nMust be opened by 09/24/12.

string.name: desc
string.value: A legendary elixir of power. Take a sip to gain a level.\n#cMaximum-level characters cannot benefit from this item.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Memo that has the Mustache Factory's phone number and the order number.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gachapon item. Use it with the Perfect Evolving Belt II in your possession to add potentials!

string.name: desc
string.value: A dusty old box from the back of Spielgelmann's Antiques Roadhouse. Valuable items await.\n#cDouble-click to open.#\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Who knows how much this thing could be worth...

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Crimson Nightmare Mount] skill for 1 year.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Crimson Nightmare Mount] skill for 15 days.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: Magical dust dropped by the Rhinojinn. It's so magical that it just might give you a lot of Artifact Points at once!

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Balrog mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Orange Mushroom mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: 7-day Yeti mount coupon. Double-click to to learn the mount skill.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A sweet potion made from Maple Syrup. Your level will determine how much HP and MP are restored. Not affected by potion related skills or potentials.
#cBelow Lv. 30: HP/MP +100
Lv. 30 - 69: HP/MP +300
Lv. 70 - 99: HP/MP +1000
Lv. 100 - 119: HP/MP +2000
Lv. 120 - 149: HP/MP +3000
Lv. 150 or higher: HP/MP +4000

string.name: desc
string.value: The Cannoneers are back in business! Increases Weapon Attack, Speed, and Jump for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift from beyond the stars for returning Legends. Allows you to teleport to any town, no matter the continent. Due to its fragile cellular structure, it implodes 24 hours after being touched. #cCan be used once every 30 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Eight wonderful years, all summed up on one little card. Double-click to obtain massive EXP boosts, depending on your level.\n#cHas no effect on max level characters. Can be used until 06/30/13, the end of the event.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box brimming with 8th Maple Birthday gifts. Double-click to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to learn [Double Maximus Mount] for 30 days from today.\nYou can use Jag Jump on this mount even if you don't have the skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to learn [Double Red Truck Mount] for 30 days from today.\nYou can use Jag Jump on this mount even if you don't have the skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to learn [Double Power Suit Mount] for 30 days from today.\nYou can use Jag Jump on this mount even if you don't have the skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary Mercedes is rocketing back to the spotlight! Increases Weapon Attack and Max HP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: The Demon Slayer is blazing back onto the scene! Increases Weapon Attack and Demon Fury for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ripe maple fruit. Double-click to obtain special gifts.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to get a random number between 1 and 10, then match them up with Spiegelmann's number to... win or something! Who knows? It's a mystery!\n#cCan be used until 06/30/13, the end of the event.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The evil hip-hop super squad, De La Meow, has taken over Kerning City's back alleys! Take those ruckus making hooligans down! \nDouble-click to travel to Funkmageddon Alley, where they were last spotted busting illicit rhymes.

string.name: desc
string.value: The evil hip-hop super squad, De La Meow, has taken over Kerning City's back alleys! Take those ruckus making hooligans down! \nDouble-click to travel to Krunkpocalypse Alley, where they were last spotted busting illicit rhymes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box to celebrate the 8th anniversary.\n#cContents will disappear after 07/24/13!#

string.name: desc
string.value: A special android coupon that grants you a Fantastical Android (M) and a Beaded Heart.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special android coupon that grants you a Fantastical Android (F) and a Beaded Heart.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box to celebrate the 8th anniversary. Double-click to open. Good luck!\n#cContents will disappear after 06/30/13!#

string.name: desc
string.value: A celebratory warp capsule. Double-click to move to White-Out Mountain, where Crazy Uncle Earmuffs hangs out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Collect 20 of these tickets and you can trade the pieces in for another ticket!

string.name: desc
string.value: Special tickets that allow you into Gold Richie's Treasure Vault, where the richest man in Maple World stores his stuff!\nDouble-click on the ticket to visit Gold Richie's Treasure Vault.

string.value: Double-click to use the [Unlucky Buddy Mount] skill for 15 days.

string.value: A letter from Burke.\nDouble-click to read it.

string.name: desc
string.value: This fragment broke away from the Enlightening Miracle Cube. Double-click to trade for useful items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thank you for celebrating our 7th anniversary with us! Open this box to get a special surprise item!

string.name: desc
string.value: Gift box obtained from filling up the Picnic Basket and taking it to Cassandra. Open this to obtain fabulous gifts! #cTip: Open it BEFORE the event ends!

string.name: desc
string.value: Magic pouch that opens up pocket slots. Useless to anyone who already opened up their pocket slot.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special gift box for adventurers that login every day. Maybe it contains fantabulous gifts? Remember to open it BEFORE the event ends!

string.name: desc
string.value:
Awesome coupon given to those that log into Maple World every day.

#cDouble-click to obtain the following effects:
Lv. 30 or lower
Weapon/Magic Attack: +20
Lv. 31 - 70
Weapon/Magic Attack: +30
Lv. 71 or higher
Weapon/Magic Attack: +40

 Stacks with other Non-Daily buffs.#

string.name: desc
string.value: An ice chest full of goodies to help you stay cool in the summer time. The contents will melt if you don't open it up by TKTKTK.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exchange this coupon for a Pink Flower Tube (7 days) by TKTKTK.\n#cDouble-click on the ticket to make the exchange.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to use the [Spaceship] mount skill for 7 days, starting from today.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to receive a Mesoranger Android.

string.name: desc
string.value: An EXP serum for Mesorangers. Increases EXP by 50%. \n#cHas no effect on Lv. 200 or above characters.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift for fledgling Mesorangers. Can be used until TKTKTK, when the contents will reconvert to pure energy.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special capsule for the Resistance. Can be moved into storage and given to another character. The capsule will expire once the event has ended.\n#cSwallowing this capsule will give you 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 and below, 5% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. Cannot be used if you're under Lv. 10 or if you're Lv. 150 or higher (Cygnus Lv. 120).#

string.name: desc
string.value: A mighty cheer for the reborn Battle Mages. Increases Magic Attack and Max MP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A primal cheer for the reborn Wild Hunters. Increases Weapon Attack and Max HP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: A supportive cheer for the reborn Mechanics. Increases Weapon Attack and Max HP for 30 minutes. The cheer grows stronger for every 5 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.value: An amazing fish with glistening golden scales! It would be great if these scales were made of real gold.

string.name: desc
string.value: A legendary fish that will make you a great singer if you eat a lot of them.

string.name: desc
string.value: A legendary fish that will make you a great dancer if you eat a lot of them.

string.value: A legendary fish that will make you well-versed in dancing and singing if you eat a lot of them.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fresh tuna can that swims peacefully under the sea.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fish in amazing color! Its bright scales make it hard to stay out of trouble.

string.name: desc
string.value: A chubby fish. It can easily float without making an effort.

string.name: desc
string.value: You cannot determine what type of fish it is from this distance, but you're sure it's a fish. Take a closer look to determine the type.

string.name: desc
string.value: You cannot determine what type of fruit it is from this distance, but you're sure it's a fruit. Take a closer look to determine the type.

string.value: You cannot determine what type of fossil it is from this distance, but you're sure it's a fossil. Take a closer look to determine the type.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicious yellow banana. You displayed it at the museum, repressing your urge to eat it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A juicy, refreshing lime. You are proud of yourself for finding such an excellent lime.

string.name: desc
string.value: High-quality muskmelon. It is often given as a gift when people pay a visit to patients.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit with an amazing secret... It grows from the grass!

string.value: A nutritious fruit that lets you live longer if you eat it constantly.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fruit in the mystic shape of a star. It is very effective for skincare.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A round dinosaur egg. Still cute! Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old footprint left by someone. Or someTHING. Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's poop. Ancient poop. This is what happens when you don't flush.

string.name: desc
string.value: Brilliant amber. An unfortunate mosquito could not escape from the ancient pine resin that turned into this stone, and is stuck inside. Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: A threatening fang of a carnivorous dinosaur. Handle with care! Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: A dinosaur's heart that turned into a gem after a long period of time. Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fossil of an ancient bird's feather. Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fossil of a creature which is assumed to be a trilobite. Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: An ammonite in a wonderful whirling shape. Double-click to display it at the museum.

string.name: desc

string.value: Special Weapon box given to purchasers of the Maple Value Pack. Open it to receive a Lv. 35 Chaos Weapon for your job.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special buff for purchasers of the Maple Basic Value Pack. Increases Weapon ATT and Magic ATT for 30 minutes. The buff effects grow stronger for every 10 levels you gain, up to level 100. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special buff for purchasers of the Special Value Pack. Increases Weapon ATT and Magic ATT for 30 minutes. The buff effects grow stronger for every 10 levels you gain. Stacks with other buffs.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A special gift box from #cMaple Administrator#. Limit one per day. Not even Maple Administrator knows what's inside. \n#cDouble-click# to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Orange Imp in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Gemstone Imp in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Fortune Moon Bunny in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your imp by feeding it gear that's similar to your level. It will reward you when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Cultivate a 7th Anniversary Potted Mini Maple Tree in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your Potted Mini Maple Tree by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with a Golden Maple Fruit when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a Tasty Watermelon Pot in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nGrow your Tasty Watermelon Pot by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with Gaga's Tasty Watermelon when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a Tasty Watermelon Pot in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking this item after you have obtained Gaga's Tasty Watermelon from the First Tasty Watermelon Pot#.\nGrow your Tasty Watermelon Pot by feeding it gear that's close to your level. It will reward you with Gaga's Tasty Watermelon when it's fully grown!

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to plant a Maple Coin Tree in your Item Pot. A Legends Maple Coin Tree consumes loot items or equipments obtained from the monsters that are in the same level range with you, and you will get a Golden Maple Fruit from the tree once it's fully grown. However, you can't receive anything from the tree after the event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Raise a cute Rainbow Fortune Moon Bunny in your item pot by #cdouble-clicking# this item.\nDouble-click on the item you obtained from the Fortune Moon Bunny to complete the Rainbow Sunday mission.

string.name: desc

string.value: A feather that has 40% chance of upgrading Maple Beryl Equipment to Crimson Maple Equipment with additional potential. You must have 1 empty slot in your Equip Inventory.\r\n#cShoulders cannot gain potential, and previous potential on the Beryl equipment will disappear if successful.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This feather has an 80% chance of upgrading Maple Amethysian Equipment to Grand Maple Amethysian Equipment with additional potentials. You must have 1 empty slot in your Equip Tab.\r\n#cCurrent potential and upgrades will disappear upon successful enhancement.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A scroll that turns a weapon into a Soul Weapon, which grows in strength by absorbing the Soul Orbs of enemies.nWeapon Attack (ATT) and Magic Attack (M.ATT) can increase up to 10%, depending on the amount of absorbed Orbs.nCan only be used on Lv

null.name: . 100 or higher weapons that are fully upgraded.nSuccess Rate: 10%

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, clothes, pants, outfit, mantle, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. Can only be used on equipment.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipment that are for #cup to 5 levels# above yours for #c3 days#. \n#cYou may not stack# #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill may not use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into an Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip armors that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Cap, shoulder accessory, tops, bottoms, outfits, capes, gloves, belt, shoes#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip weapons that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. Unable to use on the items that cannot be equipped/removed.\n#c Available slots: Weapon, shield, secondary weapon#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip accessories that are for #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Pendant, ring, eye accessory, face accessory, earrings, pocket#

string.name: desc
string.value: Drag the #cBypass Key# into the Equip window slot (#chotkey E#) to equip ETC equipments that are #c20 levels# higher than yours for #c3 days#. \nYou cannot stack and use #cBypass Keys of other levels#. Characters with the #cEmpress's Might# skill cannot use Bypass Keys. \n#c Available slots: Medal, badge, dragon, Mechanic equipment#

string.name: desc
string.value: A lunch prepared by Rat Mouth. If you can stomach it, it will increase ATT, DEF, Jump, and Speed by 5 for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: This item is used to add a socket to and item so that an Alien Nebulite can be added to it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats. Has a higher chance of granting better stats than regular Star Dust. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to randomly increase or decrease stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: 混有女媧的黃土的抽出物。往寶盒上灑的話，在寶盒灑上女媧的白土會設定為最高等級的能力值。比起女媧的黃土副產物有較高的機率調整到好的能力值。俠客的等級達120且寶盒的八卦是陽卦的話，等級會隨機上升或下降。

string.name: desc
string.value: Solidifies the effects of Star or Supernova Dust by locking the Core's current stats for 7 days. Cosmic Dust Solidifier can only be used to lock the current configuration once.\r\n\r\n#cWarning: The stat lock will be overwritten if you use an item to reconfigure the Core's stats.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 含有女媧能量的碎片。寶盒的能力值會往順時針方向輪轉一格。

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to skip the tutorial and move directly to the town for your job. Note: You will never be able to do to tutorial again with this character.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: A box with Lv. 50 equipment specifically tailored to a Maple Life Coupon character.

string.name: desc
string.value: Filled with enough knowledge to raise you one level. Does not have any effect after Lv. 50.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box with Lv. 100 equipment specifically tailored to a Maple Life Coupon character.

string.name: desc
string.value: Filled with enough knowledge to raise you one level. Does not have any effect after Lv. 100.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cupcake made of spiderwebs from an old mansion. Strangely addictive...\n+15 STR for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Soup made of zombie guts. At least it looks pretty...?\n+15 DEX for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Creepy cookie. Don't bite too hard or you may lose your teeth!\n+15 INT for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Candy shaped like a bat. Did somebody say this was made of guano?\n+15 LUK for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cake that looks like a haunted mansion. Made of the most vile ingredients possible. The frightening shape and taste draws forth the power within!!\n+15 All stats, +10 physical attack and +10 Magic attack for 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Potion that gives you the power of a restless zombie.\nIncreases ATT by 30, Jump by 30, and Movement Speed by 30 for 10 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift from the Masked Gentleman to the guests of the Halloween Masquerade. What could be inside?

string.name: desc
string.value: A box from Cole. No one knows what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A box from Stew. No one knows what's inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: A tasty, hot smore. Perfect for a toasty Halloween night!\r\nRestores 25% HP/MP, Accuracy/Avoidability +10, and Movement Speed/Jump +10 for 10 minutes.

null.name: [Restores 25% HP/MP and gives a boost of +10 to Avoidability, Jump and Speed for 10 minutes.]

string.name: desc
string.value: These supply boxes are just what adventurers need in times of...need! It can only be used during the event and it holds various game items.

string.name: desc
string.value: Cassandra made this hot chocolate just for YOU! And everyone else, most likely. Drink it to receive EXP based on your level. It is only available during the event.\n#c20% EXP if you're below Lv. 50, 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. 1% EXP for Lv. 150 and above. Only 3 can be used per day and it cannot be used if your character is Lv. 200 (Cygnus Lv. 120) or Xenon character.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click to get a permanent [Onyx Jaguar Mount].\nYou can use Jag Jump on this mount even if you don't have the skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use to tame an Onyx Jaguar. This Jaguar grants you #c120 Speed, 120 Jump, and 50% Power Stance effect#. The Onyx Jaguar will replace your current Jaguar that can be ridden.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious potion that contains the power of Chronos, a god of the ancient Giants. It can only be used at Lv. 30 or higher.\n#c*Caution: May cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A shining gift box prepared by Jingling Santa. #cDouble-click# to obtain an awesome gift. Careful, this can only be opened until 12/31/13 when Christmas event ends.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A special capsule for proteges, only good until TKTKTK.\n#c20% EXP if you're below Lv. 50, 10% EXP if you're Lv. 50 - Lv. 99, and 2% EXP if you're Lv. 100 - Lv. 149. 1% EXP for Lv. 150 and above. Has no effect on max level characters.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Transform Potion made by an Alchemist in honor of the PC Cafe Event. Not even he knows what you'll turn into! However, it can only be used until TKTKTK when the event ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Invincibility lasts 10 minutes. That's just long enough for you to run down and give Will a high-five. Can only be used for #clocal testing#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A legendary fairy potion, containing golden star fragments. Use to increase both Weapon ATT and Magic ATT by 20 for one hour. 
#cWarning#
Does not stack with other potions.
Effects only work in Root Abyss region.

#cWarning#

Buff effects increase with every 5 levels gained, up to level 100. \r\n#cStacks with other buffs. Does not disappear from inventory after use. Can be used as often as wanted, at 30-minute intervals during that day.#

string.name: desc
string.value: The legendary Chief Collector, Collectron, filled this relic with awesome stuff. There should be enough to fill a whole museum! (Double-click to completely fill the Museum in progress.)

string.name: desc

string.value: Happy New Year! This special gift is for new players joining us in 2014! Welcome to MapleStory! \n#cDouble-click to see what's inside.#

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A 5x Giant Potion for a BigWigs member. What hugely enormous powers could it grant? \n#c*Caution: May cause buffs to disappear.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases Boss ATT by 10% for 40 minutes. \n#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different types. Cooldown is 60 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases Weapon ATT by 5% for 40 minutes. \n#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different types. Cooldown is 60 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases Ignore DEF Ratio by 10% for 40 minutes.#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different kinds. Cooldown is 60 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases all stats by 5% for 40 minutes. \n#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different kinds. Cooldown is 60 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases Boss ATT by 20% for 40 minutes.#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different kinds. Cooldown is 50 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases Weapon ATT by 10% for 40 minutes.#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different kinds. Cooldown is 50 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Alchemy Masters and Renowned Masters can make this potion that increases Ignore DEF Ratio by 20% for 40 minutes.#cCaution:#\nNormally, only 1 Potion can be used at a time, but Alchemists can use 2 if they are of different kinds. Cooldown is 50 minutes.

string.name: desc

string.value: Use on a piece of equipment to give it bonus stats. If the Rebirth Flame is used on equipment that already has bonus stats, then that item's bonus stats will be reselected. \r\nEquipment items that do not have a Scissor count will have 5 Scissor uses added to them.

string.value: Drag onto a weapon to give it bonus stats. If a Spring of Rebirth is used on a weapon that already has bonus stats, then that item's bonus stats will be reselected.\r\nEquipment items that use a Spring of Rebirth for the first time will have 5 Scissor uses left.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Enhances #cupgraded equipment#.
More successes increase the chance of a good enhancement.
The item is destroyed upon failure.

#c[Enhancement Success Rate]#
1 success: 100%
2 successes: 90%
3 successes: 80%
4 successes: 70%
5 successes: 60%
6 successes: 50%
7 successes: 40%
8 successes: 30%
9 successes: 20%
10 successes: 10%
11+ successes: 5% or lower

string.name: desc
string.value: Resets all stats on an item, except for Hidden Potentials. Can only be used on equipment. If used on an item that grows, the item may revert to its pre-growth state. \nCannot be used on items that have #cScissors of Karma, Sharing Tag, Item Guard# applied. Additional stats will not be reset.

string.value: A potion made by Mr. Do to make anyone smarter.\n#c*Warning: Drink at your own risk.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A potion made by Mr. Do to cure all ailments.\n#c*Warning: Drink at your own risk.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Changes your appearance to that of sheep.#c* Warning: While transformed, your Speed is the same as a sheep.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into Hilla for 10 minutes.\n#c* Warning: You cannot climb ladders or ropes while transformed.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into Magnus for 10 minutes.\n#c* Warning: You cannot climb ladders or ropes while transformed.#

string.value: Transforms you into Von Leon for 10 minutes.\n#c* Warning: You cannot climb ladders or ropes while transformed.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Transforms you into Arkarium for 10 minutes.\n#c* Warning: You cannot climb ladders or ropes while transformed.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A black magnet that is carved out of a magical stone found near Kritias. #cDouble-click it near Frozen Anxieties with low HP to steal Frozen Arrows from them.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 50% chance of increasing the Master Level of #cBig Bang# to 30.\nJob: Bishop\nCondition: Skill Level 15+

string.name: desc
string.value: This rope is used for catching scorpions in the Ariant Scorpion Catch Tournament.

string.name: desc
string.value: A rope used to capture a tired Panda.

string.name: desc
string.value: A paper box that is used to box exhausted Panda Teddies.

string.name: desc
string.value: Herr gave you this empty bottle. Use it to contain the flow of time.

string.value: 100% chance of increasing the Master Level of #cBig Bang# to 20.\nJob: Bishop\nCondition: Skill Level 5+

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click on it to use the [Floaty Balloon] riding skill for 2 hours.\n#cEverybody in Event edition.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Try the only energy drink with the refined essence of bear, Bear Power! Restores 50 Fatigue. Cooldown is 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Are you tired? Try this new drink--a mixture of Red Moo and Vita-C! Super Moo! Restores 30 Fatigue. Cooldown is 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Raises 1 Profession at Level 9 or below to the next level.

string.name: desc
string.value: A secret box sold by Rebecca. \n#cDouble-click# to receive 1 of many consumable items. \nRebecca's Secret Box can be opened until #TKTKTK#.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to acquire a Buff Item appropriate to your level range.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch from Murgoth. You can get a Soul Shard from here if you're lucky. Pouch can't be used after the event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A pouch from Murgoth. You can get a Soul Shard from here if you're lucky. Pouch can't be used after the event.

string.name: desc
string.value: A letter handed to you by a shy Murgoth. What's it say?

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click it to acquire 10th Anniversary Coins. You won't know how many until you open it, which you should do before TKTKTK.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to gain a temporary #cTogether with Angel Mount#, which can use the High Altitude Flight skill in towns for 90 Days.

string.name: name
string.value: Together with Angel Mount Coupon 90 Day

string.name: desc
string.value: This Mable Ranger box cantons mysterious and rare items!\n#cUse before TKTKTK.

string.name: desc

string.value: A gift box made just for MapleStory's 10th anniversary. #cDouble-Click# to open.\r\n#cExpires on TKTKTK.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Transform Potion made by an Alchemist in honor of Maple's 10th Anniversary. No one know what monster you'll turn into, but it expires on TKTKTK.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the 10th Anniversary Bits will be inside this box!\n#CDouble-click to see which one. Expires TKTKTK.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A box full of Maple memories.\n#cExpires on TKTKTK.

string.name: desc
string.value: An Amazing 10 Hot Time box prepared by Cassandra.\n#cDouble-click to open.#

string.value: You've received this ticket as a reward for the Rainbow event. The evil hip-hop super squad, De La Meow, has taken over Kerning City's back alleys! Take those ruckus making hooligans down! \nDouble-click to travel to Funkmageddon Alley, where they were last spotted busting illicit rhymes.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A cold, transparent cube of ice with a mysterious-looking letter frozen within. #cDouble-click# it to receive a random item. This can only be opened until 11:59 p.m. on December 23, 2013

#c<Available Items>
- RED Coin
- Chaos Scroll 60%
- Strawberry Popsicle
- Chocolate Popsicle
- Watermelon Popsicle
- Melon Popsicle
- Unidentified Love Letter
- Trait items
- Reindeer Milk
- Sunrise Dew

string.name: desc

A cold, transparent cube of ice with a mysterious-looking letter frozen within. #cDouble-click# it to receive a random item. This can only be opened until 11:59 p.m. on January 7, 2014

- RED Coin
- Equip Enhancement Scroll
- Pinky hula hoop 
- Summer Swimming Goggles

string.value: A Soul Enchanter invented by Murgoth.\r\nOriginally developed for use by the army of the underworld, it never saw use because of its low probability of success.\r\n#cSuccess: 30%, can be used on Lv 75+ weapons#

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 30%
Changes your weapon to a Dawn weapon.
#

string.name: desc
string.value: An Upgraded version of Murgoth's Soul Enchanter.\r\nThis upgrade to the regular Soul Enchanter failed to make a splash with the underworld because the army could find no real use for it.\r\n#cSuccess: 60%, can be used on Lv 75+ weapons#

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 60%
Changes your weapon to a Dawn weapon.
#

Pink Bean's Soul Crystal.
Grants the #cPink Bean skill and bonus Potential# to #cweapons under the effects of a Soul Enchanter#.
#cBonus Potential: DEX +20
Success: 100%#
Can be used on Lv 75+ equipment

string.name: autodesc
string.value:
#cSuccess Rate: 100%
Enchant your Dawn weapon with a monster soul.
#
